text.textblock: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System
Marriner S. Eccles Federal Reserve Board Building, C Street entrance between 20th and 21st Streets NW., Washington, DC 20551.
1. Proposed expansion of operating hours for the Fedwire Funds and Securities Transfer Services. (Proposed earlier for public comment; Docket No. R-0778)
2. Any items carried forward from a previously announced meeting.

This meeting will be recorded for the benefit of those unable to attend. Cassettes will be available for listening in the Board's Freedom of Information Office, and copies may be ordered for $5 per cassette by calling (202) 452-3684 or by writing to: Freedom of Information Office, Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, Washington, DC 20551.
Mr. Joseph R. Coyne, Assistant to the Board; (202) 452-3204.
